title.en: My Observational Diary of Elena Evoy

altTitles.fr: Mon journal de mes observations d'Elena Evoy

altTitles.zh: 伊莲娜·埃沃的观察日志

altTitles.ja: イレーナ・エボイ観察日誌

altTitles.th: บันทึกสังเกตการณ์ของอิเลน่า เอวอย

altTitles.vi: Nhật Ký theo dõi Elena Evoy

description.en:
Everyone had no doubt that Johann would be the top student at the Academy. After all, he possessed a face blessed by God, a friendly personality, and was talented in both sports and academics. However, the position was taken by someone else.

"Miss Elena. Congratulations on your accomplishment."

"Thank you."

Elena, who didn't even seem to know his name, was different. She didn't say anything to him, even though most people would've taken the opportunity to talk to him.

"Do you have something more to say?”

Johann's self-esteem was shattered when he realized she had no clue who he was.

From that moment on, Johann started to observe Elena.

---
"If you're not my rival, why do I feel this way?"

Blessed with both beauty and brains, it was only natural for Johann to be the top student at the Academy — that is, until Elena Evoy appears. To make things worse, she seems completely unfazed by his charms, shattering his self-esteem. So why can't he stop thinking about her?
description.es:
"¿Por qué siento que es mi rival?"

Era natural que Johann, dotado de gran belleza e inteligencia, fuera el mejor alumno de la academia. Al menos hasta que apareció Elena Evoy, que para empeorar las cosas, no parece inmutarse ante sus encantos, destrozando así su autoestima. ¿Por qué no puede dejar de pensar en ella?
description.id:
Semua orang yakin bahwa Johan akan menjadi siswa unggul di Akademi. Lahir sebagai anggota keluarga kekaisaran, memiliki kecerdasan luar biasa baik di bidang akademi maupun olahraga, berparas rupawan, serta memiliki senyuman yang dapat memikat semua orang. Namun, itu sebelum Elena Evoy datang.

"Selamat, Lady Elena."

"Terima kasih."

Itu saja? Kenapa dia begitu dingin? Elena yang terlihat tidak mengetahui namanya berlalu begitu saja meninggalkan Johan di saat orang lain akan memanfaatkan kesempatan itu untuk bicara lebih lama dengannya. Kejadian itu membuat Johan penasaran dan terus memikirkan gadis itu hingga tanpa sadar dia mulai melakukan observasi pada Elena.
description.it:
Tutti non avevano dubbi che Johnan sarebbe stato il miglior studente dell'Accademia. Dopotutto, possedeva un volto benedetto da Dio, una personalità amichevole ed era talentuoso sia nello sport che nel mondo accademico. Tuttavia, la posizione è stata presa da qualcun altro.

"Signorina Elena. Congratulazioni per il suo risultato."

"Grazie."

Elena, che sembrava non conoscere nemmeno il suo nome, era diversa. Non gli disse niente, anche se la maggior parte delle persone avrebbe colto l'occasione per parlargli.

"Hai qualcos'altro da dire?"

L'autostima di Johnan fu infranta quando si rese conto che lei non aveva la più pallida idea di chi fosse.

Da quel momento in poi, Johnan iniziò ad osservare Elena.
description.ko:
태생부터 고귀한 황족 출신에, 명석한 두뇌, 게다가 웃음 한 번으로 사람을 홀릴 만큼 뛰어난 미모의 소유자 요한 엘도라도 페르탄.

그런 요한이 아카데미 수석 입학생이 되는 건 너무나 당연했다. 일레나 에보이가 나타나기 전까지는.

"요한, 솔직히 말해 봐. 너 일레나 에보이한테 관심 있지?"

"…누구한테 진 건 처음이니까."

완벽한 인생에 차석이라는 있을 수 없는 일이 일어났으니 마음이 어지러운 게 당연한지도 몰랐다. 그런데…

'왜 자꾸 일레나의 발자취만 좇게 되는 걸까. 적은 잘 관찰해야 하니까? 만약 그게 아니라면….'
description.zh: 全帝国每年举办的一次入学考试，录取的人可以进入帝国第一高等教育学院深造。伊莲娜·埃沃作为非皇族学生却占据了首席之位，因此受到了极大的关注。而约翰·埃多拉多·佩尔坦作为占据长达4年首席之位，这次却落在次席。他一直受到周围所有人的追崇，但在伊莲娜这里却得到了冷脸，于是约翰开始时时观察她……
